actions.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution adopting the conference report and a concurrent resolution correcting the enrollment on S. 272.

summary.text: Adopts the conference report on S. 272 (small business access to Federal procurement information) and a concurrent resolution (S. Con. Res. 58) making corrections in the enrollment of such bill.

titles.title: A resolution adopting the conference report and a concurrent resolution correcting the enrollment on S. 272.
